answers.author: Pamela Muse
answers.text:
Bruce - Active Municipal Marketing does excellent work supporting cities/counties is securing sponsors and long term partners as new revenue resources.   Las Vegas, Colorado Springs and Scottsdale are a few of their clients.  
Contact Don Schulte at Don Schulte at Don.Schulte@activenetwork.com their website is http://www.activegovernment.com/marketing-services/municipal-marketing.htm
I'm happy to provide an electronic introduction.  Alliance members get reduced rates.
Pam Muse
Western Regional Director
888-468-6450
pmuse@transformgov.org

author: Bruce Knopf
text:
Who has experience developing a program to sell advertising space on your county or city's website. If you run such a program, with whom have you contracted to sell your space?
I know of the following, all of whom contract with Municipal Media Solutions.
Alachua County, FL. Appraiser - 
Cook County Assessor - 
Bloomingdale Township 
Bloomingdale Township Assessor -
Metropolitan Mayors Caucus 
South Suburban Mayors and Managers Association
title: Genenrate revenue by selling advertising space on website
